DOC.brief_summary: This project determine whether expose youth `` fitogenic '' after-school environment emphasize vigorous exercise healthy snack favorable effect body composition ( i.e. , less fat tissue lean tissue ) , cardiovascular fitness cardiovascular disease risk profile . The environmental intervention provide nine school Augusta , Georgia , another nine school serve non-intervention comparison school . Children 3rd grade recruit participate . They follow 3 year , 5th grade . Measurements make begin end school year . The 2-hour after-school intervention offer every school day . It consist three component : ( 1 ) homework assistance ; ( 2 ) healthy snack ; ( 3 ) exercise design improve skill fitness .
